job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While it mentions AI training and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are application support and integrating human expertise with AI, not core AI development.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models, which falls under the scope of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools, even AI-related ones, involves developing and evaluating new functionalities, aligning with software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the limitations of the AI system in the context of customer support (business needs) and applying human expertise to bridge that gap.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the application of technical skills within a business context (customer support) to achieve business goals (exceptional support).

soft_skills.phrase: you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This directly points to the necessity of self-sufficiency in problem-solving and unblocking oneself.
Taking initiative to improve an existing system demonstrates ownership and a proactive approach.
